name: Extinction (itch) (Peace121, Miguel Gessaghi, Avishay21, Fireskelet)
description:
Survive in the desolate landscape whilst fighting off zombies, but you have to reuse the bullets

available both for HTML and Windows

this game has two different scores you can get they are :-

  1. How many seconds you survived
  2. How many Zombies you killed

Try beating my personal best 235 seconds and 39 kills :)
